Friday, November 8, 2024 (2:00 PM - 3:00 PM)
                        ( EST ) Description We are celebrating the Grand Opening of St. Pete's first indoor golf simulator venue. With six trackman simulators, a chipping and putting green, and lounge with alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages for your enjoyment. Our neighboring business, Bayboro Brewing, will serve our patrons from their food menu with a simple QR code ordering system in place. Following our ribbon cutting ceremony, we will hold a soft opening for friends, family and VIP Members. Come enjoy offerings from our bar menu along with Bayboro's food menu at a discounted rate. See you there. Additional Info Images × Golfology 2400 5th Ave. S. Unit A St. Petersburg , FL 33712 United States Event Contact Lynn Cissna (727) 388-0685 Send Email Friday, November 8, 2024 (2:00 PM - 3:00 PM)

Golfology Announces Groundbreaking Collaboration with Renowned Golfer-Artist "Coach Rusty" Ryan Rustand  - St. Petersburg Chamber of Commerce Skip to content JOIN MEMBER LOGIN Menu Membership Become a Member Member Benefits Member Bright Spots Ribbon Cutting Requests Bright Spot Request Form Member Job Postings Member Directory Events Calendar News Our Work 2024 Annual Report Councils and Committees Programs and Events The Greenhouse Advocacy Community Leadership St. Pete Young Professionals Leadership St. Pete Tech Founders The Foundation St. Pete St. Pete Store and Visitors Center City of St. Pete History of St. Pete Healthy St. Pete Parks and Recreation Maps The Districts Visit St. Pete/Clearwater Getting Around Destination Magazine Things To Do Beaches Eat and Drink Travel Deals Nightlife Places to Stay I Love the Burg Airports St. Pete Clearwater International (PIE) Tampa International Airport (TPA) Albert Whitted Airport St. Petersburg Economic Development Corporation Our Sports Teams The Rays Tampa Bay Lightning The Rowdies Tampa Bay Buccanneers About Us Leadership and History Nominate Leadership St. Pete Community Investors Chamber Staff Chamber Ambassadors Become an Ambassador Back to Member News & Press Golfology Announces Groundbreaking Collaboration with Renowned Golfer-Artist "Coach Rusty" Ryan Rustand By Lynn Cissna 2/18/2025 FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Contact: Tamara King Co-founder, Golfology Phone: 702-769-2444 Email: hello@playgolfology.com St. Petersburg, Fl Golfology, the premier indoor golf venue of St. Pete, is thrilled to announce an unprecedented collaboration with celebrated golfer and artist Ryan Rustand, better known to many as Coach Rusty on IG. On February 22, Coach Rusty will bring his unique blend of golf and creativity to Golfology for a live golf painting event that’s set to make history. In a first-of-its-kind experience, attendees will not only witness Coach Rusty’s extraordinary talent but also have the chance to participate in creating a one-of-a-kind piece of art. Guests may hit a golf ball directly onto the canvas to contribute to the creation of a personalized Golfology logo. “ Coach Rusty has been making waves in the golf community by combining his lifelong passion for the game with his incredible artistic abilities ,” said Tamara King, co-founder of Golfology. “ This event represents a bold step forward in redefining what golf experiences can be, and we’re excited to invite the media and community to be part of this historic moment .” This unique collaboration highlights Golfology’s mission to push the boundaries of traditional golf and create memorable, interactive experiences for enthusiasts and newcomers alike. Media outlets are invited to cover this groundbreaking event and witness the fusion of two worlds – art and golf – that will leave an indelible mark on the sport. Event Details: • What: Live Golf Painting with Coach Rusty • When: February 22, 2025 @ 12 pm • Where : Golfology, 2400 5 th Avenue S, Saint Petersburg, FL 33712 Media representatives are encouraged to RSVP to ensure access to the event and interviews with Coach Rusty and the Golfology team. For more information, please contact: Tamara King Phone: 702-769-2444 Email: hello@playgolfology.com Ryan Rustand Email: contact@artbycoach.com Images × Share × Email Facebook LinkedIn X Pinterest Close Powered By GrowthZone © 2025 St. Petersburg Chamber of Commerce | Site by GrowthZone Thank you to our Investors! 8AM Golf - Team Home Companies Team hello@8amgolf.com Home Companies Team Cart Your cart Close Cart Meet the Team Howard Milstein Chairman Howard Milstein is a philanthropist and golf entrepreneur. Starting in 2007, Jack Nicklaus selected him as his partner to ensure his legacy and institutionalize the Nicklaus brand. Subsequently he has added numerous holdings to his golf activities all operated under 8AM Golf. He loves the game of golf and all it stands for. He has dedicated these businesses to helping golfers enjoy the game more and to celebrating the great game of golf. As Chairman of 8AM Golf, Howard oversees The Nicklaus Companies, GOLF Magazine, GOLF.com, True Spec Golf, Miura, GolfLogix, Fairway Jockey, Club Conex and Chirp Golf. Read More Hoyt McGarity CEO & President Hoyt was a stand-out collegiate golfer at Lynn University and played competitively on various professional tours. He co-founded Modern Golf in 2011, a Canadian club fitting company, then became CEO of True Spec Golf in 2014, a brand agnostic club fitting company. In 2017, Hoyt assumed the role of President and CEO of Miura Golf. Soon after, Howard Milstein acquired True Spec and GOLF and consolidated his golf investments into a holding company, 8AM Golf, where Hoyt became President. His role includes creating, communicating, and implementing 8AM’s vision, mission and direction. Hoyt has created synergies and efficiencies throughout 8AM and pursues the highest quality everywhere. Read More Justin Timberlake Partner Justin is an investor and partner in 8AM Golf and leads creative initiatives across the 8AM portfolio of brands. As a songwriter, performer, actor and producer, Justin embodies effortless cool and is a globally recognized tastemaker. He's one of the best-selling music artists in history and is also an avid accomplished golfer. Justin's partnership with 8AM Golf will deepen his already-profound and rich interest in the sport of golf. Read More Lawrence Place CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER Larry is responsible for driving strategic and operational efficiencies across 8AM Golf.  He has also held various roles for the 8AM Golf portfolio companies True Spec Golf and Miura Golf - where he currently serves as President and CFO.  Before joining 8AM Golf, Larry held pivotal roles at Hewlett-Packard Company, including overseeing real estate strategy for the EMEA region during its historic split into two publicly traded companies.  Raised in Pinehurst, North Carolina, Larry's lifelong passion for golf has been a guiding force throughout his personal and professional life.  He resides in Scottsdale, Arizona and holds degrees from The Citadel and the University of Georgia. Read More James Ridout Chief Investment Officer James is responsible for managing the financial side of the 8AM Golf portfolio and finding and evaluating new investment opportunities. Prior to joining 8AM Golf, James worked as Vice President at Emigrant Capital Corp., the private equity division of Emigrant Bank and the owner of 8AM Golf. James, an avid and slowly improving golfer, brings financial and international experience to the team, having worked in various financial roles across Asia and Australia before relocating to New York. Read More Trey Marucci CHIEF STRATEGY OFFICER Trey was a division one golfer at the University of Pennsylvania.  He has an extensive professional background, including government, banking, and technology roles.   After college,Trey worked in DC for six years, including stints at The White House and the Department of Commerce, where he served as a Senior Advisor.  In 2010, Trey joined JPMorgan Chase & Co. in the Investment Bank.  Following several years at the bank, Trey assumed the role of CFO and COO for Chase Consumer Bank’s western region.  In that role, he oversaw all finance and strategy. Trey joined 8 AM Golf in 2022 as Chief Strategy Officer.  He works across the portfolio, helping to drive strategic projects and implement new initiatives. Read More Jeff Fujimoto Chief Business Development Officer Jeff serves as a special advisor to Howard Milstein and Hoyt McGarity. Prior to joining the 8AM team, he’d spent five years advising Bob Parsons at Parsons Xtreme Golf, several years as an agent to golfers under the 1 Degree Management team, and several years working for Sidney Frank on all golf-related marketing initiatives at Grey Goose Vodka. Fuj competed at Colorado State University, and after spending a few years playing golf competitively he became the assistant golf coach at both Colorado State and the University of Louisville. Read More Charlie Grace Head of Business Development Charlie focuses on emerging opportunities across the 8AM Golf platform. He also helps connect professional golfers to the 8AM Golf network of companies and works to develop new business verticals. Charlie had an impressive junior golf career and played golf competitively for Vanderbilt University. As someone who grew up around the game, he strongly believes in golf’s power to connect different types of people and businesses. Read More Kellen Tallada Head of Technology Kellen bridges the gap between golf and emerging technologies for all the 8AM Golf brands. His experience in the golf industry is well versed as the past President of Fairway Jockey. He has worked at Taylormade, Nickent Golf, Cobra-Puma Golf and Fujikura Composites. His technology background exists as an excited Founder/CEO for both Swipebox and Hyfin; fintech companies built around payments and commerce. He is the founding principal of a digital marketing firm based in Scottsdale, AZ. Read More DJ Lantz Head of Product DJ advises and acts as on camera talent to promote products and brands across the 8AM portfolio. DJ played golf at the University of Hartford and was named 2010 Scholar-Athlete of the Year. Additionally, DJ founded and continues to operate a golf clothing and accessories brand. Read More Anthony Gerard Advisor Anthony serves as a special advisor to the Chairman, and he advises the entire 8AM Golf team throughout their varied projects and initiatives. He is a director of the Nicklaus Companies, GolfLogix, and Miura Golf. Before joining 8AM Golf, Anthony had served as a director of a number of other Emigrant Capital Corporation investments. Anthony brings his extensive banking and operating experience to 8AM’s varied activities. Read More Kellie Stenzel ADVISOR Kellie serves as a special advisor for 8AM Golf where she advises Chairman, Howard Milstein on all golf assets. Kellie serves as a part of the 8AM team that finds and reviews new business opportunities with the goal to create synergies between all 8AM companies. She seeks solutions to provide golf products and services to better enable all golfers to play their best games. Additionally, Kellie is a GOLF Magazine Top 100 teacher. Read More hello@8amgolf.com © 8AM Golf Holdings LLC. All rights reserved. Golfology: A New Indoor Golf Haven in St. Pete STAFF HERE MYRTLE BEACH December 17, 2024 3:48 pm Golfology: A New Indoor Golf Haven in St. Pete Attention, golf lovers! If you’re tired of getting rained out or dealing with the sweltering Florida heat while trying to play your favorite game, there’s exciting news coming your way! Say hello to Golfology , a state-of-the-art indoor golf simulator lounge that’s set to make waves in St. Petersburg. Ribbon-Cutting and Grand Opening Celebrations! Mark your calendars! Golfology will celebrate its official ribbon-cutting ceremony on November 8 , from 2 to 3 p.m. After the ribbon-cutting, invite your friends and family to the soft opening for some sneak-peek fun featuring delicious food and drinks delivered straight from neighboring Bayboro Brewing . The grand opening bash will continue on November 9 , so get ready to swing into a whole new golfing experience! What’s All the Buzz About? Golf enthusiasts will be thrilled to find out that Golfology boasts six advanced Trackman simulators . Each simulator bay spans about 350 square feet , equipped with technology that captures your swing with precision using radars, lasers, and cameras. Die-hard golf fans will appreciate that players have access to 299 courses worldwide , with new ones added every month. So, whether you fancy yourself on the legendary Pebble Beach or want to try your skills on a lesser-known track, Golfology has you covered! What’s even better? There’s no need to worry about bad shots landing you in a ditch or dodging alligators—that’s a big plus in Florida! And let’s face it, ordering food and refreshments to enjoy right at your bay is a game changer. Bye-bye to waiting for the drink cart! A Mission with Heart Golfology is brought to life by owners Rob and Tamara King, who combine their love for the sport with a strong sense of community and purpose. Rob, an Army veteran, shares how golf played a significant role in helping him find resilience: “Resilience is a big part of golf, a skill I brought from the military.” This commitment to serve extends to their patrons, as they plan to offer military discounts and perks shortly. Leagues, Coaching, and More Not just a place to swing away, Golfology also aims to foster community and skill development. They’re considering the introduction of leagues and even lessons from local PGA pros, making it a hub for both serious players and those just looking to have some fun indoors. A Block Party to Celebrate! Get ready for a bash at Golfology’s grand opening! It promises to be a vibrant celebration filled with good vibes, making it an ideal setting for both seasoned golfers and those just curious to give the sport a whirl. Keep an eye on their Instagram for all the latest updates, and prepare to experience a golf adventure unlike any other in St. Pete! Final Thoughts If you’re tired of the unpredictable Florida weather ruining your golf plans, or if you’re just looking for a fun indoor activity, Golfology could be your new favorite go-to spot. With its innovative technology, community focus, and captivating offerings, this indoor golf lounge is sure to become the talk of the town. Don’t miss out on this exciting addition to the St. Petersburg community! Author: STAFF HERE MYRTLE BEACH The HERE Myrtle Beach Staff Writers are a collaborative team of journalists, editors, and local contributors passionate about delivering accurate, timely information to the Myrtle Beach community. As part of the HEREcity.com Network, which powers over 100 U.S. city sites including HEREcolumbia.com, our staff draws on collective experience in South Carolina journalism to cover everything from business sales and real estate developments to dining deals and community initiatives. Our Expertise and Background Local Roots in Myrtle Beach Our team includes lifelong Myrtle Beach residents and SC natives with deep knowledge of the area’s history, economy, and culture. We’ve covered key events like the recent developments along the Grand Strand, Myrtle Beach’s tourism and hospitality industry, and growth in local education sectors (e.g., Coastal Carolina University programs). Collective Experience With over 50 combined years in journalism, our staff has backgrounds in print, digital media, and community reporting. We prioritize fact-based stories, drawing from sources like the Myrtle Beach Area Chamber of Commerce, city government records, and on-the-ground interviews. Commitment to Quality Every article is a group effort, involving research, editing, and verification to ensure reliability. We adhere to journalistic standards, citing credible sources and updating content as new details emerge. ADD MORE INFORMATION OR CONTRIBUTE TO OUR ARTICLE CLICK HERE!
